title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and Docker-like model management.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backends in LangChain apps.

title: llama-index-integrations-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for local Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot frontend that streams responses from Ollama; easy Vercel deploy.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration to build shareable, debuggable LLM apps backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple CLI tool to build a local RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo demonstrating function-calling/tool-use with Ollama models via constrained generation.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client (Python) with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify integration that registers Ollama as a custom model provider for no-code LLM app builder.
